text: The city of Fredericktown, Missouri, located in Missouri's 8th congressional district in southeastern Missouri, is the county seat and the largest city of Madison County, Missouri. {| class="wikitable sortable" ! Mayor ! Took office ! Left office ! Additional information |- | Reuben Albert * (1843-1921) | | | He served as the first mayor of Fredericktown and also served as its postmaster. Born in Marion County, Illinois, he served in Company K Illinois Infantry during the Civil War. |- | Val Schlesinger * (c.1857-1924) | | | c. 1900 |- | Sam Mitts | | | c. 1917-1918 |- | William A.
